creator: dannyju@yahoo.com
text:
Notice in the JSP servlet code generated by 5.5.23, the method name and variable
name corresponding to JSP tag has a different pattern from previous revisions,
specifically the '005f' after the '_' character:
  private boolean _jspx_meth_bean_005fmessage_005f0
(javax.servlet.jsp.tagext.JspTag _jspx_th_html_005fhtml_005f0, PageContext
_jspx_page_context)

In 5.5.20, it looks like:
  private boolean _jspx_meth_bean_message_0(javax.servlet.jsp.tagext.JspTag
_jspx_th_html_html_0, PageContext _jspx_page_context)

Bugzilla is not a discussion forum.

http://tomcat.apache.org/lists.html
creator: markt@apache.org
dannyju@yahoo.com
markt@apache.org
text: Your product should not be relying on internal Tomcat behaviour.
